creatingResource.title: A Memoir by the Creator of NIKE by Phil Knight
creatingResource.body: Shoes of Life. The story of Nike told by its founder is a book by Phil Knight, the founder of Nike.

updatedPost.title: The Adidas Archive. the Footwear Collection
updatedPost.body: More than 100 years ago the brothers Adolf (Adi) and Rudolf Dassler made their first pair of sports shoes.
